Html:
Thanks for the project.
I want to know how to bulid up a parametric equalizer for playing.I've seen BiQuadFilter.cs,but I still can not understand.
Could you give me some codes for buliding a parametric equalizer.
Thank you very much.

some examples of using effects with NAudio can be seen in the SkypeFX project (skypefx.codeplex.com). NAudio does not include a parametric EQ, so you would need to find an algorithm yourself. MusicDSP is a good place to start.

Mark
